title: How do I get started with JavaScript?
body: I'm new to programming and want to learn JavaScript. What resources would you recommend for beginners?
author: John Doe

comments.body: I would recommend starting with the JavaScript documentation on MDN Web Docs. It's a great resource for beginners.
comments.author: Jane Smith

comments.body: Freecodecamp.org is also an excellent resource for learning JavaScript with interactive tutorials and projects.
comments.author: Bob Johnson

title: What's the difference between let and var in JavaScript?
body: I've seen both `let` and `var` being used for variable declaration in JavaScript. What's the difference between them?
author: Alice Williams

comments.body: The main difference is that `let` has block-level scope, while `var` has function-level scope. `let` also doesn't allow redeclaration of the same variable within the same scope.
comments.author: Tom Brown
